title: Is He Wrong For Proposing With *This* Ring?
description:
If your partner gets on bended knee and proposes to you with a ring pop, how would you react? A clip went viral of this exact situation, and the woman was not pleased at all. But is she wrong for how she handled the situation?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
